seclists.description: SecLists is the security tester's companion. It's a collection of multiple types of lists used during security assessments, collected in one place. List types include usernames, passwords, URLs, sensitive data patterns, fuzzing payloads, web shells, and many more.

payloadsallthethings.description: A list of useful payloads and bypass for Web Application Security and Pentest/CTF

hacktricks.description: Give FREE access to EDUCATIONAL hacking resources to ALL Internet.

peass.description: Script that finds weakness in Linux/Windows os
